subject: Wrong order received
description_text:
Hi,

I just got my order #SSN3305 delivered.
There is no "Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for
Vibration Feedback" in the package. There is only pedals with baseplate.
Only one part of my order was delivered. Please explain.

conversations.body_text: Hi Kacper Myga,  Here is your logistics tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2533700710139483

Hi Kacper Myga,    We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. Due to recent warehouse overload, the VAM Pro order appears to be delayed. We will expedite its shipment as soon as possible and appreciate your understanding. We apologize for the inconvenience.

Tracking of the package is not working and i still have not recived the
package
Can you help me?

czw., 4 gru 2025, 10:32 użytkownik service@simsonn.com
Hi Kacper Myga,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. I see your package has been delivered—did you receive it?

Yes, all good

pon., 22 gru 2025, 13:16 użytkownik service@simsonn.com
